OSMLY is a simple import editor for OpenStreetMap. It makes importing simple by presenting features one-by-one, allowing you to make any necessary adjustment to positions or tags, flag problems, or upload directly to OSM. Other users can also edit simultaneously from the same pool of features. The aim is to make importing basic features quick, easy, and cooperative.
